tag_list: thomas-lin, investment-banker, venture-capital, technology, innospring, incubator, silicon-valley
overview:
Thomas currently works as an Investment and Business Development Associate with InnoSpring, Silicon Valley’s first US-China technology start-up incubator.

Previously, Thomas worked as an investment banker assisting technology enterprises with financial and strategic initiatives. He shares experience across a variety of fields including technology startups, venture capital, sell-side M&A investment banking, buy-side M&A private equity, alternative investment funds, and wealth management. He received his B.S. from the Haas School of Business at University of California, Berkeley in 2010 and is bilingual in English and Mandarin.

degrees.subject: Business Administration
degrees.institution: Haas School of Busines at University of California, Berkeley
